1307150.name: MLF: Pro Catch
1307150.description:
Welcome to Major League Fishing®: Pro Catch - the ultimate fishing adventure that blends lifelike simulation with thrilling competition. Whether you're an elite angler or a weekend hobbyist, get ready to experience the most immersive fishing sim ever made.

Equip yourself with authentic gear from Mossy Oak®, Abu Garcia®, Fenwick®, Hardy®, Pflueger®, Greys®, Berkley®, Duckett Fishing®, Lew's®, Strike King®, Zebco® and more. Customize rods, reels, baits, and tackle boxes to match your style. Upgrade your boat and sonar to gain the competitive edge.

Travel across the globe, from crystal-clear alpine lakes to deep-sea fishing hotspots. Every location features stunning visuals, dynamic weather, and ecosystems filled with realistic fish behavior and hidden gems.

Bass, trout, marlin, and monstrous deep-sea predators- every fish is a challenge. With different fish AI and behaviors, each catch is always a challenge! Sharpen your technique and master the art of fighting.

Chill in solo mode or join global multiplayer tournaments. Compete with friends, share your biggest catches, or climb the online leaderboards as part of your fishing crew.

With realistic environments, responsive casting, and a full day-night cycle, MLF: Pro Catch offers a satisfying blend of hardcore realism and arcade-style fun.

Think you’ve got what it takes? Join fast-paced, skill-based tournaments for a shot at real-world rewards - exclusive gear, leaderboard glory, and bragging rights. It’s easy to enter, tough to master, and always worth the fight.
1307150.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
